MenuPage.title: Menu
MenuPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).

hero.title: Weekday lunch at Palermo Uppsala

content.title: Uppsala's most laid-back lunch
content.description: No stuffy business lunches here. Just students and locals gathering over proper comfort food and pizza downtown. Perfect for tight budgets and big appetites - which is exactly why we've kept our prices honest since day one.

SEOSection.title: Affordable pizza, meat dishes and more in the heart of Uppsala
SEOSection.badge: EXPLORE PALERMO'S MENU WITH AFFORDABLE PIZZA, PASTA AND MORE ‚Äì IN THE HEART OF UPPSALA
SEOSection.heading: A menu for all tastes and wallets
SEOSection.description1: Palermo is an affordable restaurant in the heart of Uppsala ‚Äì specifically at Sysslomansgatan 7. Here our guests are met with a varied menu with everything from pizza to meat dishes.
SEOSection.description2: With us, you'll always find something that suits your taste buds. Whether you're craving a classic pizza, pasta, or one of our meat dishes ‚Äì Uppsala's on the table after dinner and when the stomach is talking. Our menu is divided into clear categories that make it easy to find what you're craving.
SEOSection.description3: Whether you're in the mood for a creamy pizza, a hearty pasta dish, or perhaps a classic cut of meat ‚Äì Palermo offers something for all tastes. Our professional staff ensures that prices remain low in Uppsala. The main restaurant is perfect for both students and families.
